import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export default class expensecreate extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ type:' ', name:' ', sku:' ', unit:' ', hsn_code:' ', sac:' ', quantity_purchased:' ', quantity_total:' ', selling_price:' ', description:' ', taxable:' ', tax:' ', active:false, check:false, check1:false, taxx:[], loadedFiles:[], file:[], pro:' ', images:[], gs:[], st:[] } } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } async componentDidMount() { await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/shared/gst/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err); }) await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/shared/state/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err); }) } render() { return (

New Expense

) } }
